attributes.action: Make running a cat over and not reporting it illegal
attributes.additional_details:
The current petition has received tremendous support and has been all over the media. I’ve also met with Sir Oliver Letwin my local MP to get moving on this. 
I feel for this to work all cats need to be legally microchipped and then involvement with the cats protection league and the RSPCA to set up a hot line to call if you run a cat over and can’t find the owner.
attributes.background: After losing my cat Bertie last April I discovered that it’s not illegal to stop and report it if you run a cat over, I’ve set up a petition already on change.org and have over 220,000 signatures already, I now need to transfer those signatures to this site.
